titleStmt.title: The method of mental prayer render'd practical and easie for all sorts of persons compos'd in French by R.F. Francis Nephew, S.J. ; to which is added a method how to offer up Mass, according to the four ends of this sacrifice.
Methode facile d'oraison reduite en pratique. English
titleStmt.author: Nepveu, François, 1639-1708.

notesStmt.note: Caption title: An easie method for mental prayer, reduc'd to practice.
Translation of: Methode facile d'oraison reduite en pratique.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
